manifest.name: babel-plugin-react-require
manifest.description: Babel plugin that adds React import declaration if file contains JSX tags.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build-examples
scripts.test-coverage: npm run build && istanbul instrument --output lib-cov lib && mocha --reporter mocha-istanbul
